title: clicks and downloads
extract: In Web advertising, a click is an instance of a user pressing down (clicking) on a mouse button in an ad space. The term clickthrough is also sometimes used. The click rate is the number of clicks on an ad as a percentage of the number of times that the ad was downloaded with a page.
extract_html: In Web advertising, a click is an instance of a user pressing down (clicking) on a mouse button in an ad space. The term clickthrough is also sometimes used. The click rate is the number of clicks on an ad as a percentage of the number of times that the ad was downloaded with a page.
